headline: Corning, GlobalFoundries Partner on Detachable Fiber Connectors for AI Data Centers
summary: Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is one of the best American stocks to buy and hold for the next 3 years. On September 29, GlobalFoundries Inc. (NASDAQ:GFS) and Corning Incorporated announced a collaboration to develop detachable fiber connector solutions for GlobalFoundries’ silicon photonics platform. The initiative will meet the increasing requirements of AI datacenters for high bandwidth and […]
